description: It is a TMT10Plex proteomics dataset used for relative protein and phosphoprotein quantification in the manuscript entitled "Protein mimetic amyloid inhibitor potently abrogates cancer-associated mutant p53 aggregation and restores tumor suppressor function". It contains both non-phosphorylated (used for identification and quantification of total proteomes) and phospho enriched (used for identification and quantification of phosphoproteins) dataset.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: alpha helix mimetics, amyloid, apoptosis, cancer therapeutics, DNA-binding domain, oligopyridylamides, mutant p53, pancreatic cancer, protein aggregation, tumor suppressor

terms.name: Dataset with no associated published manuscript

title: Protein mimetic amyloid inhibitor potently abrogates cancer-associated mutant p53 aggregation and restores tumor suppressor function
